typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	FileNameDataFlow as string
}
source(output(
		{LearnignUnitCode (Internal CAP)} as string,
		LearningName as string,
		TraningId as string,
		EventNumberName as string,
		LastModifiedDate as string,
		TrainingCreatedDate as string,
		CreateByName as string,
		TrainingContact as string,
		TrainingHours as string,
		TrainingEmail as string,
		Learning10 as string,
		Learning20 as string,
		Learning70 as string,
		TrainingStartDate as string,
		TrainingEndDate as string,
		EventMinEnroll as string,
		EventMaxEnrolment as string,
		TrainingObjective as string,
		CostName as string,
		DemandRequire as string,
		PostAssessment as string,
		KnowledgeSkill as string,
		TrainnerName as string,
		InhousePublic as string,
		VendorSession as string,
		Location as string,
		TrainingStatus as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CustomFieldData
source(output(
		InternalReference as string,
		ExternalReferance as string,
		Name as string,
		Description as string,
		ContentType as string,
		DisplayType as string,
		CreateOn as string,
		Priority as string,
		EnrolmentMode as string,
		EnrolmentCount as string,
		CPDLearningHours as string,
		CPDPoints as string,
		AccessCount as string,
		RatingMean as string,
		RatingCount as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
CustomFieldData unpivot(output(
		CustomFieldName as string,
		CustomFieldValue as string
	),
	ungroupBy({LearnignUnitCode (Internal CAP)},
		LearningName),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: true) ~> UnpivotCustomFieldNameValuew
FilterNotExist derive(UpdateDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> AddUpdateDate
UnpivotCustomFieldNameValuew derive(Signature = sha2(256, {LearnignUnitCode (Internal CAP)} ,CustomFieldName,CustomFieldValue)) ~> AddSignatureNew
source1 derive(Signature = sha2(256, InternalReference,CustomFieldName,CustomFieldValue)) ~> AddSignatureExist
derivedColumn1, AddSignatureExist exists(AddSignatureNew@Signature == AddSignatureExist@Signature,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> FilterNotExist
AddSignatureNew derive(Date = toTimestamp(
    concat(
        substring($FileNameDataFlow, 12, 4),'-',
        substring($FileNameDataFlow, 16, 2),'-',
        substring($FileNameDataFlow, 18, 2),' ',
        substring($FileNameDataFlow, 20, 2),':',
        substring($FileNameDataFlow, 22, 2),':'
    )

,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm')) ~> derivedColumn1
AddUpdateDate alterRow(upsertIf(!isNull({LearnignUnitCode (Internal CAP)}))) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		InternalReference as string,
		ExternalReferance as string,
		Name as string,
		Description as string,
		ContentType as string,
		DisplayType as string,
		CreateOn as string,
		Priority as string,
		EnrolmentMode as string,
		EnrolmentCount as string,
		CPDLearningHours as string,
		CPDPoints as string,
		AccessCount as string,
		RatingMean as string,
		RatingCount as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['InternalReference','CustomFieldName'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		InternalReference = {LearnignUnitCode (Internal CAP)},
		CustomFieldName,
		CustomFieldValue,
		UpdateDate,
		FromFileDate = Date
	)) ~> sink1
